com.atakmap.android.contact

Class GroupContact

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.hierarchy.items.AbstractHierarchyListItem2
      • com.atakmap.android.contact.Contact
        • com.atakmap.android.contact.GroupContact
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HashtagSearch, Action, Search, HierarchyListItem, HierarchyListItem2
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RoleGroup, TeamGroup

    public class GroupContact
extends Contact
implements Search
    A group containing multiple contacts Custom group classes should extend off this

                    java.util.List<Contact> contacts,
                    boolean userCreated)
        A group that has a multiple endpoints.
        Parameters:
        uid - UID of group
        callsign - Display name of group
        contacts - List of contacts under this group
        userCreated - True if the group was user-created

      • getExtraView

        public android.view.View getExtraView()
        Description copied from interface: HierarchyListItem
        Returns the extra view, if any, associated with the node. The extra view occupies the space to the right of the line item and can be defined as the developer sees fit. Clicks should be passed through so you can include simple stuff like text, or more interactive things like buttons or check boxes. Should occupy space nicely with range and bearing values if any are present. If no extra view is associated with the node, the space will be empty.
        Specified by:
        getExtraView in interface HierarchyListItem
        Overrides:
        getExtraView in class Contact
        Returns:
        The extra view associated with this node, or null if there is no view.
